title: Worship and its Music
description: The nature of worship and the role of music within worship in historical, theological, and cultural perspectives. Field trips to services of various traditions.

title: Worship Practicum 1
description: Skills development and practice in planning and leading Christian worship, including such activities as choosing and accompanying hymns, song-leading, teaching new music, the use of instrumental music, reading scripture, leading prayer, movement, and gesture.

title: Worship Practicum 2
description: A continuation of CMW201. Skills development and practice in planning and leading Christian worship, including such activities as choosing and accompanying hymns, song-leading, teaching new music, the use of instrumental music, reading scripture, leading prayer, movement, and gesture.
